description: Attached alternators will not produce any power.

mending_methods.name: Replace worn drive belt
mending_methods.description: Remove the old drive belt and install a new one.
mending_methods.success_msg: You wrap a new drive belt around the %s's components.

description: Impairs the engine's ability to start in low temperatures.

mending_methods.name: Replace faulty glow plugs
mending_methods.description: Disconnect the faulty glow plugs and install a new set.
mending_methods.success_msg: You disconnect the %s's faulty glow plugs and insert new ones.

description: Prevents the engine from starting.  An immobiliser stops a vehicle from running without the appropriate key; since you don't have that key, you'll need to manually deactivate it instead.

mending_methods.name: Deactivate immobiliser
mending_methods.description: Deactivate the immobiliser that's preventing the vehicle from starting.

description: Prevents the engine from starting.  A damaged pump means that diesel can't be pumped and pressurized from the vehicle's tank.

mending_methods.name: Replace faulty diesel pump
mending_methods.description: Depressurize the fuel line and replace the broken pump with a new one.
mending_methods.success_msg: You depressurize the fuel line and swap out the %s's faulty diesel pump.

description: Heavily increases fuel consumption, and causes the engine to produce more exhaust.

mending_methods.name: Replace expired air filter
mending_methods.description: Replace the expired air filter with a clean one.
mending_methods.success_msg: You swap the %s's air filter and discard the old one.

description: Reduces the engine's performance, and increases the risk of backfires or failures to start.

mending_methods.name: Replace expired fuel filter
mending_methods.description: Replace the expired fuel filter with a clean one.
mending_methods.success_msg: You swap the %s's fuel filter and discard the old one.

description: Prevents the engine from starting.  A damaged pump means that gasoline can't be pumped from the vehicle's tank.

mending_methods.name: Replace fuel pump
mending_methods.description: Drain the gas line and replace the broken pump with a new one.
mending_methods.success_msg: You drain the gas line and swap out the %s's fuel pump with a new one.

description: Has no immediate effects, but can impair long-term engine health.  A non-functional water pump prevents the engine from properly being cooled, increasing the risk of eventual damage from overheating.

mending_methods.name: Replace defective water pump
mending_methods.description: Replace the defective water pump with a new one.
mending_methods.success_msg: You replace the %s's defective water pump.

description: Prevents the engine from starting.  A broken starter means that the energy required to start ignition can't be delivered to the engine.

mending_methods.name: Replace faulty starter motor
mending_methods.description: Remove the faulty starter motor, and replace it with a functioning one.
